Talk_0211:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive><clr:0000>Three<clr:ffff> more buildings are in need
of repairs.

I've got high hopes and high expectations
about what you can accomplish.
Talk_0212:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Thanks to your efforts, more than half of
the village has been restored.

There are just <clr:0000>two<clr:ffff> buildings left in need
of repairs. The day of Lurelin Village's
splendor is close at hand!
Talk_0213:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>We are so close...<sp:5:0:0> So close. I feel
overwhelmed by my own anticipation.

We are down to...<sp:5:1:0><clr:0000>one<clr:ffff> building left that
needs repairs!

I know I've relied on you heavily through
all of this, but...<sp:5:0:0>please help us cross the
finish line.
Talk_0100:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Thanks to you, Lurelin Village has been
restored. You must feel a kinship with this
place after all the work you put in, hm?
Please feel free to ask me anything about
the shops in the village. Whatever I can
do to help.
Talk_0101:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_01>There's plenty to see and do around here.
You can get yourself some new gear,
for one. What are you up for?
Talk_0102:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>Ah, then you should take a look at the
inn, the restaurant, and the general store.
Talk_0103:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Aha, the inn! Yes, that would be
Chessica's place along the coast.

Her <clr:0000>salt spa<clr:ffff> is particularly popular,
especially for weary travelers looking
for rejuvenation.
If you have <clr:0000>rock salt<clr:ffff>, savior, you can use
the salt spa for <clr:0000>free<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0104:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Kiana's cooking is the best in the village—
No, in all of Hyrule! You'll find her
restaurant near the village entrance.
Princess Zelda was a frequent patron and
loved Kiana's cooking as well.

In fact, the princess was the one who
named it Azure Bay!

<snd:Happy_00>Kiana enjoys preparing <clr:0000>rare and exotic
cuisines<clr:ffff>, so it's always a special treat.

And, savior, it's all free for your use,
of course.
Talk_0105:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>You'll find it located at the end of the
pier. If you see the flashy-looking boat,
then you're in the right place.
The shop offers <clr:0000>rare goods<clr:ffff>, and travelers
come from afar just to shop there.

Of course, savior, everything available
there is <clr:0000>free<clr:ffff> for you and you alone.
Talk_0107:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>Fun, you say?<sp:0:4:0>You should take a gander at the Lucky
Treasure Shop and the Lurelin Water
Rally, then.
Talk_0108:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Mm-hmm, that's the big boat-shaped
house by the mountain, savior. The game
is simple—just choose a chest!
The owner, Cloyne, is very particular
about the prizes he gives away. They're
wonderful, and the shop is popular for it.
Cloyne won't let you play continuously
though. I suppose that builds
suspense, hm?
<snd:Think_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Savior, I'll let you in on a little secret... If you have a
<clr:0000>porgy<clr:ffff>, something good might happen if you <clr:0000>cook<clr:ffff> it
and hide it in your pouch before you play.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0109:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ah yes, our famous race, in which you
ride a vehicle on the water!

The racing pros and Bolson adjust the
course daily to keep things fresh.

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Maybe we should rename it to the "Savior's Race"...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0110:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Are there any other shops you're
curious about?
Talk_0111:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>You're basically one of us now, savior,
after all you've done. Feel free to use
anything here as much as you like.
Talk_0112:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Lurelin Village is almost asleep, and so
am I. Time to head home.

Please head to the inn for some shut-eye.
Nothing like dozing off while gazing at
your own handiwork, hm?
And if you have any <clr:0000>rock salt <clr:ffff>on you, it's
a great opportunity to take a dip in the
<clr:0000>salt spa<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0200:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Does the heart good knowing Lurelin
Village is being rebuilt through the
generosity of others.
Talk_0113:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sleep>Zzz... Our village...<sp:5:0:0>will be known...
all across...<sp:5:0:0>Hyrule...
Talk_0201:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Some folks treat manual labor like sport—
they get a kick out of hefting and hauling
things around.
If you're like that, I bet you'd even enjoy
something as cumbersome as moving
around big, heavy logs.
Talk_0114:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Beautiful weather makes for beautiful
shopping, I always say.
Talk_0202:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I'm glad those pirates got what was
coming, but some of the villagers still
haven't returned yet.
If the village is restored to its former
glory, they'll come wandering back.
You'll see.
I...have no basis for that, mind you—I can
just feel it in my bones.
Talk_0115:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Aha, the savior of Lurelin Village.<sp:5:0:0> We're
always pleased to see you visit, savior!

Please feel free to ask me anything about
the shops in the village. Whatever I can
do to help.
Talk_0203:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Wherever they are, I hope the villagers
who've yet to return are keeping dry.

I keep thinking about the day when they
return home and fall asleep under their
own roofs, listening to the waves...
Talk_0116:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Interested in the shops here, are you?<sp:5:0:0>
Please, have a look around.
Talk_0204:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>It's nearly impossible to do this work
when it's raining. I bet most everyone
would be happy for a break, anyhow.
Most of the folks of Lurelin Village
prefer a leisurely pace.
Talk_0117:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>That would be Garini's shop at the end
of the middle pier.

However, his boat, which is his tool for
acquiring his wares, has gone and
floated off...
When he was in full swing, travelers from
afar would come to shop his <clr:0000>rare goods<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I sure hope his boat comes home soon...
Talk_0205:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>On behalf of the village, thank you for
restoring the inn.

The owner, Chessica, has since returned,
and I'm betting the travelers who visit will
spread the good news about the village.
Thanks to you and Bolson, things are
looking brighter here.
Talk_0118:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Garini and Mubs, a sweet married
couple, set up shop on the middle
pier awhile back.
But they fled due to the pirate invasion...


A little bird told me that they headed for
a <clr:0000>fort <clr:ffff>of some sort. Type of place where
folks go for refuge?
Now that it's peaceful and pirate-free,
I sure hope they come on back and
reopen the shop.
Talk_0206:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Now that the restaurant is shipshape,
the villagers are all aglow.

Kiana's cooking goes a long way in
restoring people's spirits.

My spirit is lifted, too, thanks to your hard
work and kindness.
Talk_0207:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>You've gone and done it again! The
Lucky Treasure Shop is fully restored.

The owner of the shop likes to entertain
and delight people.

We all love it there, me included. So
happy to see it's back up and running.
Thank you!
Talk_0120:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Of course, of course. If it's about the
village, I'll explain as many times as
you need.
Talk_0208:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>I'd all but given up hope on ever seeing
my house put back together... And yet,
there it is, just as I remembered it.
Thank you. Thank you so much.<sp:0:4:0>A village heirloom was hung up
inside, and wouldn't you know it,
it's undamaged!
Please, go on inside and have a look at it.
Talk_0209:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>It's been some time since I've seen Armes
this happy...<sp:5:0:0> Thank you for repairing
his house.
Armes is an exceptionally generous
person who shares his daily catches.

Please, help yourself to what he's
brought in!
Talk_0210:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive><clr:0000>Four<clr:ffff> more buildings are in need
of repairs.

I'm keeping an eye on repairs, for the
good of the village. I'm sure you'll help
as you're able.
